Title: The Dread Citadel - Naxxramas
Description:
Long ago, magical wards placed upon Naxxramas stymied our attempts to assault Kel'Thuzad's forces. Though I was able to conceal our army past them, I have since learned to dispel them should the need ever arise.

I will confess my disbelief of your story. However, if you are so devoted to this investigation, I will enchant your insignia so you may breach these barriers yourself. For a small fee.
ObjectivesText: Archmage Angela Dosantos in the Eastern Plaguelands wants 2 Arcane Crystals, 3 Large Brilliant Shards, and 30 gold pieces. You must also be Revered with the Argent Dawn.
